attributes.action: Turn Your TV Off For A Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We spend far too much time watching TV, and it uses up loads of energy.  Rather than turning off other stuff to power our TVs, let's TURN OFF OUR TVs!

I propose we Turn Off Our TV on 5th November 2007.  Remember, remember the 5th of November.

It only has to be for 12 hours.  Listen to the radio - read a book - listen to silence.
